name: RockWood Equity Partners
overview: RockWood Equity Partners LLC is a private equity firm specializing in leveraged transactions including management buyouts, recapitalizations, growth equity, mature, turnaround investments, PIPEs, and lower middle market companies. It typically invests in niche manufacturing, value-added distribution, and business service companies based in North America with a focus on the United States and Canada. The firm prefers to invest in companies having sales between $10 million and $100 million and EBITDA between $2 million and $7 million, with more than 15 percent margin in it. It makes controlling or significant minority equity investments in its portfolio companies. The firm can also make investments where owner operator is retiring or key executives are to be recruited. RockWood Equity Partners LLC was founded in 1999 and is based in Cleveland, Ohio with an additional office in New York, New York.
